name: purescript-d3v4
description: a clean new wrapper for (parts of) d3 at version 4

scripts.example-barchart: bower link && cd examples/barchart    && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-default: bower link && cd examples/default     && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-dragpanzoom: bower link && cd examples/dragpanzoom && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-fivecircles: bower link && cd examples/fivecircles && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-forcelayout: bower link && cd examples/forcelayout && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-gupIII: bower link && cd examples/gupIII      && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-radialcluster: bower link && cd examples/radialcluster      && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-packagetree: bower link && cd examples/packagetree        && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-tree: bower link && cd examples/tree        && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build

author: andrew condon
